user_query: I'm planning a surprise anniversary celebration for my parents and I want to create a memorable slideshow of their journey together. Can you suggest some romantic songs and love quotes that I can include in the slideshow? Additionally, provide me with some interesting historical facts about their wedding year.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of romantic songs suitable for an anniversary slideshow.
Collect love quotes that express the essence of romance and partnership.
Look up and compile interesting historical facts related to the year of their wedding.
Combine the collected songs, quotes, and historical facts into a structured format for the slideshow.
